titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to extend the provision relating to medicare-dependent, small rural hospitals, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S828)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/27/1993--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to revise Medicare-dependent, small rural hospital provisions. Permits such hospitals to decline reclassification as urban.
